spend_time: Spend your time on more important things!
surface_irrigation_desc: Water pipes are laid across the ground with a neat main line and secondary parallel lines branching off from it, covering all the trees.
underground_irrigation_desc: Water pipes are laid underground with a neat main line and secondary parallel lines branching off from it, covering all the trees.
problem_desc: There are problems like having to pay the gardener every month with additional expenses, or leaving work tired and watering the garden for hours.
solution_desc: Water your entire garden with the push of a button from anywhere with your mobile device, and make sure all your trees are watered.
benefits_desc: You are freed from additional gardener's expenses, from some trees not being watered, from wasting time spent watering the garden.
monitor_manage_title: Monitor and manage irrigation with the mobile app
monitor_manage_desc: Control the watering time of your garden and the amount of water used with your mobile phone.
about_azirrigation: Azirrigation, an innovative domestically produced company, offers a solution to implement smart irrigation for crops and gardens without the human factor. Local products in the Azerbaijani market have helped many entrepreneurs become smart in their gardens and farms. A team of professional agronomists, engineers and programmers will offer you solutions consisting of the most modern technologies.
more_information: Get more information about our services by contacting us you can.
